title: Value Is Number
description: In this lab, we will focus on creating a JavaScript function that checks whether a given value is a number. We will make use of the typeof operator and a safeguard against NaN to ensure that the function returns true only for valid numbers. This lab will help you improve your understanding of JavaScript data types and type checking.

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
